= Dragon's Nest =

The '''Dragon's Nest''' is a tropical archipelago. Its most famous feature is the high concentration of draconic [[Vores]] that gather around the island chain.

Various [[Dragon Cults]] and [[Summoners]] congregate around the archipelago, maintaining an uneasy truce with the resident dragons.
